医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
杜克工程师开发了AI平台，以靶向不良疾病蛋白杜克大学的生物医学工程师开发了一个基于AI的平台，该平台设计了短蛋白，称为肽，能够结合和破坏以前不受困难的引起疾病的蛋白质。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250131/duke-engineers-develop--ai-platform-to-target-target-undroggable-disease-proteins.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250131/duke-engineers-develop--ai-platform-to-target-target-target-undroggable-disease-disease-proteins.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4c822830-32f0-43b4-43b4-8eab-7753f3cac182 Fri, 31 Jan 2025 10:03:29 -0500 Duke engineers develop AI platform to target undruggable disease proteins
与交通相关的空气污染可能会增加代谢相关脂肪肝病的风险一项新的研究表明，长期暴露于交通相关的空气污染水平较低会损害肝脏，并可能增加代谢相关脂肪肝病的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250131/Traffic-related-air-pollution-may-raise-the-risk-of-metabolic-associated-fatty-liver-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250131/Traffic-related-air-pollution-may-raise-the-risk-of-metabolic-associated-fatty-liver-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=720B8AF2-3949-4139-98CF-7C8D404BBBEAB Fri, 31 Jan 2025 09:50:55 -0500 Traffic-related air pollution may raise the risk of metabolic-associated fatty liver disease
通风和空气清洁剂可能会增加医院的气溶胶扩散根据UCL和UCLH研究人员的一项新研究，通风和空气清洁剂的使用量增加，旨在减轻病毒感染在医院中的传播，可能会产生不可预测的影响，并可能导致病毒颗粒的移动更多。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250131/ventilation-and-yair-cleaners-may-increase-aerosol-serosol-spread-in-hospitals.aspx.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250131/ventilation-and-yair-cleaners-may-increase-increase-aerosol-spread-in-spread-in-hospitals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3fb56820-55A2-4BFA-BA85-D8C6F0E38AD2 Fri, 31 Jan 2025 08:37:20 -0500 Ventilation and air cleaners may increase aerosol spread in hospitals
亨斯曼癌症研究所以高级机器人手术技术领先犹他大学的亨斯曼癌症研究所（U）自豪地宣布增加了两个Da Vinci 5机器人手术系统。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250131/Huntsman-Cancer-Institute-leads-the-way-with-advanced-robotic-surgery-technology.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250131/huntsman-cancer-institute-leads-leads-the-way-way-with-ad-ad---------------------------------------------------------------------- https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8ddB2424-43E9-4A3F-ABE2-734214848709 Fri, 31 Jan 2025 08:27:15 -0500 Huntsman Cancer Institute leads the way with advanced robotic surgery technology
研究人员创建人类基因组的随机版本来研究疾病科学家已经实现了人类细胞系最复杂的工程，这表明我们的基因组比以前认为的更具弹性的结构变化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250131/researchers-create-random-versions-of-human-genomes-genomes-to-study-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250131/researchers-create-rande-random-versions-of-human-genomes-genomes-to-study-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=30cd2656-23c8-4255-8144-7642c6b3964b Fri, 31 Jan 2025 08:23:18 -0500 Researchers create random versions of human genomes to study disease
研究揭示了有益的肠道微生物如何分解健康的粘液已经对肠道下部发现的微生物进行了全面的分析，并发现其重点饮食将糖锁定在粘液中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250131/study-reveals-how-beneflic--beneflic-gut-gut-microbe-break-break-down-down-mucus-for for-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250131/study-reveals-how-beneflic--beneflic-gut-gut-microbe-break-break-break-down-mucus-for-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=87422134-A929-48A7-AD24-4EEB955511343 Fri, 31 Jan 2025 06:53:58 -0500 Study reveals how beneficial gut microbe breaks down mucus for health
新研究挑战母亲在怀孕期间的健康与自闭症风险之间的联系尽管许多研究报告了怀孕期间母亲的健康状况与孩子的自闭症风险之间的联系，但一项新的研究表明，几乎所有这些“关联”否则可以通过遗传学，暴露于污染和进入等因素来解释卫生保健。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250131/new-study-challenges-link-link-bet-mothers-mothers-health-dring-pregnancy-and-autism-----aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250131/new-study-challenges-link-link-bet-mothers-health-dring-pregnancy-and-autism-------------aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=A9A36332-9517-4634-A4F8-C8-C8AFDADEB4B8 Fri, 31 Jan 2025 06:26:19 -0500 New study challenges link between mother's health during pregnancy and autism risk
特朗普关于性别肯定护理的命令升级了跨权利的逆转唐纳德·特朗普（Donald Trump）总统周二通过一项行政命令撤销了政府对跨性别权利的逆转，该命令试图通过禁止政府资助的青春期封锁者或19岁以下的人进行政府资助的封面保险或手术来干预父母的医疗决定。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250131/trumpe28099s-order-onder-on-gender-gender-crirming-care-care-care-care-carate-versal-verser-verser-verser-versal-trans-trans-rights.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250131/trumpe28099s-order-onor-on-gender-gender-gender-crirming-care-care-care-carate-carate-versal-ververs-verser-vorser-versal-trans-trans-rights.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=69598ADA-7E44-4913-9218-A305C0A62D70 Fri, 31 Jan 2025 06:00:21 -0500 Trump’s order on gender-affirming care escalates reversal of trans rights
Tbornottb：一种新型的AI驱动工具，用于简化医院的结核病评估这项研究介绍了TbornottB，这是一种CDSS，旨在改善结核病评估和简化隔离决策，减少劳动，同时保持检测准确性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250131/tbornottb-a-a-novel-ai-ai-driven-tool-tool-tool-to-toolline-tuberculisosis-evaluation-evaluation-in-hospitals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250131/tbornottb-a-novel-ai-ai-driven-tool-tool-tool to-streamline-tuberculisosis-evaluation-evaluation-in-hospitals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=416A614E-4A8C-4EB4-96DB-0B-0B-0B3C137DBD67 Fri, 31 Jan 2025 05:58:00 -0500 TBorNotTB: A novel AI-driven tool to streamline tuberculosis evaluation in hospitals
陷入困境的蒙大拿州医院的大修使立法者陷入困境蒙大拿州议员正在努力努力改善该州精神病医院的患者护理和运作，因为意识到恢复陷入困境的设施良好信誉的努力可能需要更多时间。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250131/drawn-over-overhaul-of--------------------------------------------------。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250131/drawn-over-overhaul-of------------------------------------------------------------1/news/news/news/news/news/news/news/news/news/news/news/news/news-montana-hospital-hospital-leaves-leaves-leaves lawmakers-in-limbo.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5B1B4527-3C0C-4509-97E4-502F2A140393 Fri, 31 Jan 2025 05:57:38 -0500 Drawn-out overhaul of troubled Montana hospital leaves lawmakers in limbo
